result.eng: We do not live in the the twentieth century any more!

result.eng: She had heard the story from her mother who was seventy at that time.

result.eng: Two men twenty years of age were taken to prison.

result.eng: He enlisted in the army when he was 18 years of age.

result.eng: He is only two years old.

result.eng: He was made king when he reached 18 years of age.

result.eng: She started going to school when she was seven years of age.

result.eng: By the end of the 17th century slave ownership was ended in Europe.
